Uses of CacheOperation in com.google.code.ssm.api
 

Classes in com.google.code.ssm.api with annotations of type CacheOperation
 interface InvalidateAssignCache
          This annotation effectively takes information out of the cache, removes value from cache under InvalidateAssignCache.namespace(): InvalidateAssignCache.assignedKey() key.
 interface InvalidateMultiCache
          This annotation effectively takes information out of the cache, removes many values from cache.
 interface InvalidateSingleCache
          This annotation effectively takes information out of the cache, removes single value from cache.
 interface ReadThroughAssignCache
           
 interface ReadThroughMultiCache
           
 interface ReadThroughSingleCache
           
 interface UpdateAssignCache

Uses of CacheOperation in com.google.code.ssm.api.counter
 

Classes in com.google.code.ssm.api.counter with annotations of type CacheOperation
 interface DecrementCounterInCache
          Decrements by 1 single counter under given key.
 interface IncrementCounterInCache
          Increments by 1 single counter under given key.
 interface ReadCounterFromCache
          Reads counter value from cache.
 interface UpdateCounterInCache
          Updates counter's with value returned by method if method is annotated with ReturnDataUpdateContent or with value from method parameter annotated with ParameterDataUpdateContent.
